title: Pattern For Embroidery
medium:
Printed pattern (in blue) for Cut Fabric embroidery. Design of a female figure holding a jug.
Technique: Printed on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: at bottom within design "Hebe" outside design "St. Paris 6410/51" and " Depose"
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Mertz
description: Printed pattern (in blue) for Cut Fabric embroidery. Design of a female figure holding a jug.
